This is a complete hack of Final Fantasy 4 (2 US) for SNES which shows off many of the features of the hacking utility, FF4kster. There are a few assembly hacks which cannot be achieved within the editor alone, but they are few in number and mostly for cosmetic purposes.

It may seem at first that the changes are limited to gameplay and the plot is unchanged, but don’t worry, there is a point in the plot after which it branches from the original and begins an entirely new chain of events.

name: Tetris
description:
Tetris was a game for the Sega Mega Drive that was cancelled due to licensing issues.

The game was subsequently released on the Sega Mega-Tech, an arcade cabinet that played Mega Drive games. It was re-released as part of Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 28: Tetris Collection in 2006.

name: Tetris
description: The System E Arcade System port of Sega's Tetris.

name: Final Fantasy IV: Ultima
description:
Final Fantasy IV - Ultima is a ‘deluxe’ version of Final Fantasy II for the SNES. This hack adds a bunch of additions to the base game while keeping the majority of the main story intact and the feel of FF2US the same.

List of features, additions and changes:
- Party Swapping among 11 different members at Endgame!!
- Dark Knight Cecil now available at endgame!!
- A Full-Featured Bestiary!! A Brand New Title Screen!
- A VERY Challenging BOSS RUSH Mode unlocked at endgame!!
- New Game+ mode with higher MAX level/stats!!
- 58 New Weapons! Including Magically Imbued Weapons!
- 62 New Spells/Summons! Also revamped existing spells!
- 38 New Bosses! Brand New Boss at Endgame with Randomized AI!
- New Achievements Feature at: https://retroachievements.org/game/1072
- New Status ‘Aura/Color’ for buffs/ailments during battle!!
- Damage Limit increased to 14999! Can turn Encounters On/Off!
- New Areas! New Side Quests! New and Upgradable Commands!!
- New Optional Patches for Alternate Sprites and Palette!
- New Enemy Graphics! New Events! New Endgame Scenarios!
- New Equipment/Spell Menus with DETAILED info!!
- New attack/swing/spell animations!
- New weapon graphics!! New sound effects! New items!!
- New maps, new areas and new edits to overworld maps!
- New events! New enemies!! Sprint with the Y button!!
- New commands for characters. New Armors and Gears!
- Revamped shops/equipment and balanced their progression.
- Dark Knight Cecil now dual-wields and is 2-handed!!
- Edge is now buffed offensively! Can steal Rare items!
- Rydia has new summons!
- Cecil has been buffed as a tank.
- Rosa can use more combative gears and new spells.
- Kain has various new spells and commands.
- Yang, Edward, Palom, Porom and others have also been buffed!
- Lots of secrets that can lead to early acquirement of better equipment!
- Few minor tweaks to the base game such as save points, etc.

name: Guilty
description: Guilty is a first-person psychological horror game. Play with Peter and discover what your past hides. Access your unconscious to remember your traumas and the scariest memories that are hidden. A traumatic past that gives you a feeling of guilt.

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Postal 2 Table Pack
description: The official Postal 2 Table Pack. Flip through the Dude's universe in these 4 unique tables. All in-game content is authentic, featuring materials and assets from the original PC hit!

name: Terrible Clicking Game
description: A Games based on multiple interpretations of click-based input, to control the game

name: Mega Drive Mini
description: The Japanese version of Mega Drive Mini has a different line-up of games from the Western version.

name: Omi Oh My AI
description: Go on a captchavating adventure and solve over 100 unique puzzles generated by our quirky AI, Omi! Learn to see the world the way AI does with image, word, and number puzzles in this game inspired by AI, the 90’s, and the constant need to prove you’re not a robot.

name: Criminal Stories: CSI Episode
description: Sin descripción

name: Kids: Zoo Puzzle
description: Kids: Zoo Puzzle offers unique fun and relaxing jigsaw puzzles! The game shows you cute pictures of exotic animals, which can be divided into different numbers of pieces to make your challenge easier or harder.

name: Jewel Diamonds
description: This match 3 game is perfect wherever you are! It’s one of the most addictive games to play! Play it and see for yourself.

name: Poly Link: RPG Girls
description: "Poly Puzzle: RPG Girls" combines cool low-poly puzzles and sweet anime girls. Solve the puzzles and collect the cute girls.

name: Interkosmos 2000
description:
Go to space. Save the Future. Try not to Die.

Welcome (back) to the world of Interkosmos for an even wilder, weirder and more wondrous adventure.

Experience the intense exhilaration of spaceflight. Explore the awe-inspiring interiors of a realistic space capsule.

Master the crucial systems that will keep you in orbit (and breathing). And while you’re at it, try your best not to die.

Should you complete your mission, you just might save the future – and yourself. Should you fail? Let’s not think about that.

With more challenges, more stunning visuals and more hours of replayability than ever, the year 2000 has never been so thrilling.

name: Stellaris: Plantoids Species Pack
description: Plantoids Species Pack introduces a new phenotype for players with original art and animations. As the title implies, Plantoids will give Stellaris fans access to a plant-like species that has gained sentience and begun to spread its tendrils across the galaxy, planting the roots of new civilizations on new planets.

name: Surviving Mars: In-Dome Buildings Pack
description: Expand your colony with the first Surviving Mars Content Creator Pack. Includes: Smart Apartments, Seniors Residence, Large Nursery, Dome Sweet Dome, Medical Post, Security Post, Hospital, TV Studio Workshop and School Spire.

name: Ultimate Flying Cars
description: Sin descripción

name: Family Road Trips
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Drive Mini
description: The version of Mega Drive Mini released in Korea and China had a different line-up than that of the ones released in Japan, North America and Europe.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Gold
description: Includes the original game with latest official patch and the Test Drive Unlimited Megapack add-on. The add-on includes 45 cars from manufacturers such as Holden, Edonis, RUF, Lexus and others, one motorcycle, a mode of increased realism of driving vehicles, an improved steering support system, as well as support for widescreen resolution, which is also present in the console versions of the game.

name: Space Invaders
description:
The handheld version of the 1999 Space Invaders for consoles. Developed by Crawfish Interactive, it features different graphics and power-ups, a password system to access levels and an exclusive soundtrack. The player can choose between three different ships to control, a first in the series. There's also a dash mechanic, enabled by double tapping left or right.

The game has link cable support for two player action and is compatible with both Game Boy and Game Boy Color.

name: Princes of Light
description: Sin descripción

name: City of Billiards
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr Secret Agent
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Virus Collection
description: This is a large collection of games about the famous coronavirus. Here are games of different genres. A classic arcade game and an interesting adventure in which you will be given different tasks every time you start the game. Play and enjoy. And don't forget to take care of your health.

name: Archer Peerless
description: Sin descripción

name: Fire Storm
description: Sin descripción

name: PlayStation Classic
description: The version of PlayStation Classic released in Japan, Taiwan and Hong Kong differs from the international version in its line-up of games.

name: World of Anterra
description: Inspired by modern and classic games, World of Anterra is a highly interactive, nonlinear, open world RPG. The game features an endlessly explorable open world, deep progression systems, fast paced combat, and rich lore, all wrapped in a satisfying and accessible interface.

name: Game Gear Micro Black
description:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Sonic the Hedgehog
Out Run
Puyo Puyo 2
Royal Stone

name: Game Gear Micro Blue
description:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Sonic Chaos
Gunstar Heroes
Sylvan Tale
Baku Baku Animal

name: Game Gear Micro Yellow
description:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Shining Force: The Sword of Hajya
Shining Force Gaiden: Ensei – Jashin no Kuni he
Shining Force Gaiden: Final Conflict
Nazopuyo Aruru no Ru

name: Idle Ark: Sail and Build
description: Idle Arks: Sail and Build is a unique game where you are like in the movie "Waterworld" on your own one of the few ships in the world sailing in search of a new home. The player places blocks to build a ship, which must be placed correctly, so as not to collide with other ships and objects. You can build a mast, deck, sails, hull, rigging and rudder. Blocks can also be used to place cannons, anchors and even a submarine. To indicate in which direction to sail, you must place a flag. After placing all the blocks you can set sail by choosing the direction and speed. You can control the ship with the arrow keys. The up and down keys change the sails, and the keys left and right to change the rudder. The game will please and mini-game in which you can take part in a sea battle against enemy ships, shooting at them with guns. A bonus for destroying blocks will be the opportunity to win additional ships.

name: Game Gear Micro Red
description:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible Special
Revelations: The Demon Slayer
Columns
Shinobi

name: Fog and Sea
description:
A remake of a Mini Jam 81 game of the same name.
You're from a place where the dead move to places built on or around giant creatures. speed date these creatures to find out where you'll wind up in the afterlife!

name: Game Gear Micro White
description: A special edition of the Game Gear Micro included in the Aleste Collection: Game Gear Micro Limited Edition.

name: They Seem to Be Very Good Friends
description: Puzzle game created for the online exhibition "This game is romantic, dangerous and intense".

name: TurboGrafx-16 Mini
description: The TurboGrafx-16 Mini, also known as the PC Engine CoreGrafx Mini in Europe, is a dedicated home video game console by Konami modeled on NEC's TurboGrafx-16, which was designed by Hudson Soft, a video game developer which Konami acquired in 2012. The Mini emulates the original console's 8-bit hardware.

name: PC Engine Mini
description: The PC Engine Mini is a dedicated home video game console by Konami modeled on NEC's TurboGrafx-16, which was designed by Hudson Soft, a video game developer which Konami acquired in 2012. The Mini emulates the original console's 8-bit hardware.

name: Sentry
description:
In Sentry, you play as a social media content moderator.

How many days can you last before you're fired for filing too many incorrect reports? How many images of exploited children and beheadings can you endure before you can't take it any longer?

name: THEC64 Mini
description: THEC64Mini (or THEC64 MINI) is an updated version of the Commodore 64 home computer, manufactured by Retro Games Ltd. and distributed by Koch Media. It is based on an ARM CPU A20 SoC and Linux operating system running the VICE emulator. It connects via HDMI to any ordinary home TV. It comes supplied with 64 classic C64 games, such as Uridium, Paradroid, Hawkeye, Nebulus, and Monty Mole.

name: Transaction Failed
description:
A story about being queer in a capitalistic world.
A story about escaping a convenience store. (where you can only trust the employees.)
A story about yellow. about its past, present and future.
Try to find an exit or the store will close down and you will be forever alone!

name: Neo Geo Mini
description: The original Japanese edition of the Neo Geo Mini, released only in Japan.

name: Under Maintenance
description: After a rough day at work, all you want to do is settle in with your favorite otome game, only to realize it's gone down for maintenance. How will you pass these troubling times? Risk going to a watering hole to drown your sorrows in a beverage of choice? Begrudgingly scroll through a dating app to meet your love for the night? Either way - adventure, shenanigans, and hot singles in your area await! Disclaimer: heartache probable - choose wisely.

name: Break Up! and Find Love
description:
Break Up! And Find Love... is a pair matching game where you must break lovers couple to match them with their real soul mate. It can be played on both Windows and iPads.

Across 4 chapters and 48 levels, spread the love by reuniting people with their soul mate (or at least someone they will be more happy with)!

name: No Place Like
description: Pour yourself a cup, take your time & enjoy. Choose a cup you'd like to have your coffee in & add in whatever else you like. This is a cozy point & click game, where you can go at your own pace - there is no end goal, make as much coffee as you like! There are also 6 hidden little coffee beans for you to find in the kitchen. Remember, there's no place like home (whatever home might mean for you).

name: Sixty Second Heist
description:
You've only got 60 seconds to pull it off!
The heist of the century, or something like that...

All mini-games are either click or click-and-drag.

name: American Gangster
description: Set in the Harlem of the 70's, American Gangster: The Mobile Game takes players deep into the film's vice-laden setting as players either work their way up the ladder of the underworld as Frank Lucas or try to take down the crime empire as outcast cop, Richie Roberts

name: Shop of Things
description:
On a gloomy afternoon, a sudden burst of rain sends you under a shop's roof.

But was it just bad weather, or did someone (or some...thing) want you under this very roof in this very moment?

Find out, by stepping into the Shop of Things!

name: Softball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition
description:
This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!
Purchase and play our new Christian themed video games releasing every Sunday morning in the PlayStation Store today!

name: Darts
description:
Darts is based on the classic 501 dart game, starting with a score of 501 your goal is to 0 with the minimum number of dart throws and just like the classic game you can score doubles and triples. There are 15 rounds and in each round you throw 3 darts, the player to either reach 0 or has the lowest score wins the game.

Play against family and friends or play against the computer’s smart artificial intelligence (AI) player, either way, winning won’t come easy.

name: Mad Runner
description: Sin descripción

name: Cuber
description: This is a 3D Platform adventure that brings you across the cuber Multiverse. Try And complete the mission and Make the tough jumps so you can get to your reality.

name: Destroy All Humans! Crypto Does Vegas
description: Sin descripción

name: Amazônia
description: Amazônia is a remake of the original text-based game, now being a point-and-click adventure where, after your plane crashes, you need to survive and escape the Amazon rainforest.

name: Coronavirus
description: This game is dedicated to everyone who is fighting the terrible virus that has infected humanity. Take control of the nano-bot and destroy as many coronaviruses as you can. But do not touch the red blood cells! Go ahead, hero. Destroy the infection together in this dynamic arcade shooter with great music!

name: Coronavirus: Doom and Destiny
description: Fight in the epic battle of humanity against the terrible virus. Take control of a nano-bot that is able to withstand the virus in the human body. Complete 20 to 30 tasks to destroy the coronavirus once and for all. At each launch, the game will offer you something new. We will help humanity in a great battle.

name: Coronavirus: Doom and Destiny 2
description:
In this game you have to take control of the newest invention - the Crow bio-robot for destroying viruses. Get the operator's tasks and do everything to kill the virus in the body.
Let's help together in the destruction of the merciless virus that has struck humanity! Good luck pilot!

name: Coronavirus: Second Wave
description: Sin descripción

name: Destroy All Humans!
description: Destroy All Humans! was a tie-in mobile phone game of the PlayStation 2 and Xbox versions of the game. The game could be downloaded by texting CRYPTO101 to 69847 (MYTYHQ).

name: Destroy All Humans! 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Six Braves: Assassin
description: Purchase 1 of 6 Braves - Assassin

name: Six Braves: Enchanter
description: Purchase 1 of 6 Braves - Enchanter

name: Six Braves: Summoner
description: Buy the character shown and start a new adventure! The new character will have new skills, exclusive equipment, and a new plot as well as new secrets to solve. The structure of the interior of the Tower will also change according to the new character

name: Six Braves: Undead warlock
description: Purchase 1 of 6 Braves - Undead warlock

name: 2Tinycowboys
description: 2Tinycowboys is an action-packed western-themed arcade multi-scrolling platformer in 2D, with huge variety, in which you take the role of one of 9 different cowboys, each with his/her own play-style. It has up to 4 players split-screen multiplayer available and quirky game-play and characters.

name: 34Everlast
description: This is a super-concentrated action entertainment for busy working adults. The game is an action puzzle game where your discoveries and actions unravel a complex and intertwined world of breathless action in a dying world.

name: 69 Yuuko Hot
description: 69 Yuuko Hot - is a game that contains elements of a novel and a memory puzzle. You meet a beautiful girl Yuuko. But there is one problem. She loves to be tied up and hung on chains. Solve memory puzzles and get rewards you're sure to love.

89 is a simple platforming game that features a small twist, there is only one checkpoint in the whole game, located halfway through the game. It features straightfoward level design, 1-bit pixel art graphics and controls that are simple and intuitive.

name: Achievements City
description: Build a big Cyber / SCI-FI city broken down into multiple districts to grow the population through simple actions.

name: Age of Gladiators: Reforged
description: Age of Gladiators Reforged is a remake of the 2016 indie game. A single-player strategy/management experience set at the height of the bloody gladiatorial games in ancient Rome that allows you to manage your fighters as they increase in level, forging them into killing machines and champions.

name: A Hero's wish
description: You will be the heroine and have a mission to defeat the devil. You will encounter many people and monsters on your way to the devil. Depending on your choice, someone will be an enemy and someone will be allies. Check now for the ending you will reach with your choice.

name: Alcyon Infinity
description: Destroy hordes of ever-improving enemies and their Mothership. Alcyon Infinity is a fast shooter/bullet hell with dynamic movement and risk management. Up to 4 Co-Op players with Controllers.

name: Arrow
description: Move the arrows and collect the dots, but you can only move the arrows if their direction matches your moves. You will also find challenges such as teleporters and rotators that will put you thinking and make this game a real challenge for your brain.

name: Arithal
description: Arithal: Chapter Ildsted is a classic adventure game combined with turn-based battle mechanics, set in a dark-but-lighthearted world wreathed in snow and beset by monsters from the depths of the ocean. Survive at all costs.

name: Armoured Cavalry: Operation Varkiri
description: Double joystick / mecha / roguelike, 9 types of mecha with different characteristics, matched with 100 skills, drive powerful war machines!

name: Astro VR
description: Freely travel among the stars and planets in this VR only astronomy simulation. Experience space from some of the smallest solar system bodies to the largest stars. See planets, moons, asteroids, trans-Neptunian objects and, of course, thousands of stars and their exoplanets.

name: A Survivor Girl
description: A girl who crashes on exoplanet begins to survive desperately.

name: A Tale of Saviors: Garuda Academy
description: A Tale of Saviors: Garuda Academy is a 2D turn-based RPG with narrative storytelling. Set in a modern world 10 years after the mystic beast war.

name: A Tragic Accidental Still Life
description: A kleptomaniac ambulance driver struggles to break free from life's great dismal cycles through theft and daydreams in this three act arcade adventure.

name: A Violent Revelry
description: Explore a procedurally generated world, bolstering your strength in increasingly absurd ways in your quest to slay the hidden gods.

name: Bad Night: First Incursion
description: Play as a sexy female alien investigating the origin of the cataclysmic attacks on her home world. You will encounter a plethora of characters, both friend and foe, which can fall victim to your powers of seduction. If you like fast paced, retro style games with adult content, then get this game!

name: Bass Blasters
description: Bass blasters is a survival twin sticks shooter that builds levels based on the audio you choose to upload! Shoot varying projectiles at a wide array of enemies that spawn based on the activity of the different audio channels.

name: Battle Survival in Space
description: Crowds of aliens attack from all sides, collect the necessary skills and survive.

name: Beacon of Neyda
description: In a world where a robot revolution failed, the last humans search for a way to survive and escape. Beacon of Neyda is a side-scroller strategy game where you have to survive waves of enemies while creating and upgrading your base. Build where you want - Defend what you can.

name: Bee Craft
description: Real-time simulation game of bees Can you survive?

name: Bowling Hills
description: Bowling Hills is an exciting golf/bowling mashup! Each lane offers a new set of hills and hazards that requires you to change your approach. There's a surprising amount of strategy and skill in this unique bowling experience!

name: Bounce racing car
description: Bounce racing car is a sideboard jump racing game with simple controls and challenging enemy chases. How to play: Press the space bar and the vehicle will activate the built-in super magnetic system and bounce over obstacles.

name: Bone Lover
description: Hide & seek game with horror elements. Get into the role of kidnapped teenagers, and escape the psychopath’s house. Look for items that will help you get out. Will you succeed, or will the characters meet their doom?

name: BornWild Versus S1: Prologue
description: 2053, biotech searchers are abducted, two skilled mercenaries have to extract them. BornWild • Versus is a video-based visual novel with a thrilling action/ sci-fi story. Experience the series in two ways: Watch & Chill or collect every detail and make the best choices in Intelligence Ops mode.

name: BornWild Versus S1: Ep.1 to 8
description: In 2053, war is big money. When biotech searchers are abducted, two skilled mercenaries have to extract them. To accomplish their mission, they’ll have to face the n°1 private army. BornWild • Versus is a video-based experience with a thrilling action/ sci-fi story

name: Bubble Wars
description: Embark on an epic adventure with Rick the Hamster to defeat the Bubble Monsters and save the love of his life!

name: Breachway
description: Assemble your crew, load out your ship, and explore the galaxy in this deck-building space roguelike. Your deck is determined by your spaceship's loadout, mix and match equipment to discover different powerful card synergies, and obliterate your enemies in tactical space battles

name: Brazilian Street Food Simulator
description: Experience the dynamics of preparing Brazilian Street Food, such as Sugar Cane Juice, Pastel, and Tapioca. Play around with typical equipment, vehicles and processes from Brazilian street vendors. A casual simulator game without time pressure.

name: BLR80
description: A sci-fi action VR game where you play a fugitive who has taken it upon himself to stop the OJI corporation from turning humans into mindless drones. BLR80 combines sights and sounds of Bangalore along with free flow action combat to root the player in an alternate version of the city.

name: Blood and Sorcery
description: Journey through the mysterious land of Notor and find the corruption within! Fight bosses, learn abilities and become the most talented mage alive!

name: Blankiball: Der Trinksportsimulator
description: Finally, a fun drinking sports simulator. In Blankiball you bring the German trendy sport beer ball or flunkyball into your living room. Play online or locally against your friends in multiplayer mode.

name: Blade Jumper
description: In 2045, a super-large building was built in the middle of Yeouido, Seoul. The name of the building is Kukuru Tower. You have to enter Kukuru Tower, whose height is unknown, to overthrow the dictatorship that dominates the city. Even if you fall, jump again and go up!

name: BlackBox
description: A plane has crashed in the Indian Ocean, search the database and listen to the Cockpit voice recordings to uncover what happened. Blackbox is a 'Her story' inspired detective game, where you investigate an aeroplane crash. The devil is in the details.

name: Better Off Dead: Life as a Prison Guard
description: Story driven first-person comedy-thriller where you are tasked with guarding a small prison for 7 days.

name: Best Friend
description: Best Friend is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you in the story of a girl who moved in with her friend in New York. She lives side by side with her until she finds out that she is a lesbian. The game is filled with sex scenes, humor and romance.

name: Be My Loyal Subject
description: The reign of King Ulric begins. Help him decide how he will rule his kingdom. Between the clergy, the army, the merchants, and the common people, will he treat them fairly? Maybe he will find love in one of his followers...

name: Bunker 21: Extended Edition
description: All the people in the world have disappeared. The main character is left alone. He goes on a journey in search of answers. He will have to fight terrible monsters and unravel the secrets that the mysterious Bunker 21 hides in itself

name: Cairn: Stone Balancing
description: Cairn is the most relaxing game you'll ever play.

name: Camp Laughter
description: A single player, low-poly horror game about escaping a killer-infested campground

name: Cannon Jump
description: "Don't forget to bring your cannon! Shoot down and jump up, it will help you,” said the old pirate. I left the tavern determined to find the mysterious island. Legend has it that countless treasures are kept up there.

name: Captain Firehawk and the Laser Love Situation
description: A shoot-em-up of macro proportions! When size-morphing alien girls decide to attack the world, only one man is able to stand against them and put things right- a pizza guy with a pilot's license.

name: Capture the Flag
description: Team up in epic 4v4 battles in this unique spin on the classic sport/gamemode!

name: Cargo Chaos
description: Cargo Chaos is a PVP social deception game where 1 pirate & a mole play against a team of crewmates. The crewmates have to repair all the communication equipment on board to call in the evacuation helicopter. They will have to work together to do the repairs, but don't trust everyone blindly...

name: Car Jump Challenge
description: Use your car to overcome obstacles, beat the time and win

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Aston Martin
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Aston Martin DLC includes 4 licensed cars: - 1963 Aston Martin DB5 - 2007 Aston Martin DBS - 2019 Aston Martin Vantage - 2022 Aston Martin DBX - R6 Tadek Marek - V12 AM11 - V8 M177 twin-turbocharged V8 RWD & AWD

name: Carta Marina
description: Carta Marina is a map of Scandinavia drawn by the Swedish pastor "Olaus Magnus" (1490-1557) We are starting an attempt to turn this map into a simulation game All the information will be from the 16th century, and you will be able to learn about the Nordic values of the time

name: Cataire: Gambling with cats
description: Cat + Solitaire = Cataire (legal gambling with cats). Purrfection graphic, You can playing CATAIRE with mouse, meow sounds and purrfect music. Cats would buy CATAIRE (if they could play). Buy it right meow!

name: Catgirls From My Sweet Dream
description: ♥Catgirls From My Sweet Dream♥ - a fun and simple satirical visual novel with “Match3” gameplay in the Magic 1980s Japanese setting. Japanese goodies and Catgirls!

name: Catherine Ragnor: Blackbeards Fury
description: Play the second part of the great Match3 saga! After her adventures with the cursed captain of the Flying Dutchman, Catherine Ragnor has a new ship. Yet when she returns home after a long voyage, she finds that her village is under attack by the notorious pirate Blackbeard. Help her to defeat him!

name: Cavatus
description: The war against Professor Zor was won, but the price was high. Technologies were destroyed. Only a few ancient flying machines remain. Professor Zor might still be alive and start another war. You must prevent that!

name: ChainSki
description: Chain Ski is a fast paced open world snowboarding game. Race against the clock or take on the challenging obstacle courses. Earn XP and upgrade your gear to take things to the next level.

name: Charming Blood
description: a visual novel that has many choices that affect not only relationships with girls, but also the fate of the hero. What will be the fate of the young vampire? Will he be able to defend his right to exist, or will he go all out, succumbing to temptation?

name: Chicken Feet
description: Chicken Feet is a first person survival-stealth horror game about a giant, angry chicken. Descend into the depths of GOOBER laboratories and uncover the horrors that lie beneath the lab's shiny façade.

name: Chess Dungeons: Shubousha
description: Help the white pieces escape by solving chess puzzles ranging from beginner-level to more experienced challenges in this Japan-themed sokoban-style game.

name: Chris Isn't Alone
description: Can you convince a demon from another realm to spare your life? Chris Isn't Alone is a visual novel horror/comedy game that gives players freedom to choose their own path towards their fate. This is a student project!

name: Chris' Story
description: Welcome to Chris' Story~ It's a 2D platform action role-playing game. You're gonna be playing as a young mercenary, Chris. To tell an adventurous story about freedom and growth.

name: City Bus Driver Simulator
description: Dear passengers, please take the seats provided. Does that sound familiar? Try what it's like to be a real bus driver.

name: CIV
description: Build your civilization, research technologies, expand your cities and defeat your foes!

name: ClearIt 13
description: "ClearIt 13" is a large and bright game that includes over 220 multiple levels of various complexity with Match3 gameplay.

name: Code:29
description: This is a post-apocalyptic zombie shooter game. You can switch between first person and third person. You can switch between first person and third person. Multiple bosses, multiple choices, multiple endings.

name: Code Zin: Esper Arena
description: Code ZIN: Esper Arena is an action, arena, third-person shooter, with an anime character aesthetic. Test both your reflexes and strategy in adrenaline-inducing combat. Succeed and become immortalized or fail and be forgotten. This is your chance for glory.

name: Crossroad of Worlds: 100 Doors - Collector's Edition
description: What lies behind closed doors? What secrets lurk inside the rooms? Find the answers to these questions and make your escape! Are you ready to take up the challenge?

name: Crescent Cauldron Cafe
description: Crescent Cauldron Café is a casual co-op management game where you play as two sisters running their family's café. Both sisters are witches of a different variety and use their abilities for different roles. Manage a storefront, fly on a broom to deliver orders!

name: Crash Override
description: Power up your arsenal in this cyber roguelite action shooter. Race against time - surf the cybernet - stop the total infection of your mainframe by a malicious virus. Rezz, power up, collect your arsenal, battle hordes of glitches - become overpowered - stop the virus!

name: Cosmotica
description: Cosmotica is a tough-as-nails first-person platforming game that tests your platforming prowess in the void of deep space. Jump, walljump, and dash through 30 hand-crafted levels. Master the high skill movement that makes for fun speedruns through the levels.

name: Corndog
description: "CORNDOG" is a 2d sidescroll runner game with a cute character. While playing, one can experience from a casual Korean style city mood to an inspiring mother nature. Run through four different stages following along a simple story line!

name: Cordbot
description: Short game about solving wire puzzles with an adorable robot protagonist. Solve various puzzles involving cords, electrical wires, lasers and more. Pick up plugs and place them in sockets to open doors and turn on devices. Complete 30 handcrafted stages with increasing levels of difficulty

name: Cookie Clicker but You Type
description: Cookie Clicker but You Type is an incremental strategy-based typing game. Type words to earn keys, a currency which can be used to buy upgrades to earn keys faster. The addicting nature of progression in this game helps typists enjoy practice.

name: Arise from Shadows
description: Lost, isolated, you must find the truth by exploring the remains of an ancient extinct civilization. With your animal possession abilities, you have all the tools to find the answers to your questions.

name: Arena Clash
description: Packed with epic characters and intense vehicle combat, Arena Clash places your Hero in 15v15 battles where you fight for humanity’s survival. The battle for tomorrow begins today!

name: Arcade Dungeon
description: Arcade Dungeon is an exciting variety game where 1-4 players can enjoy tons of arcade inspired mini-games together online or locally.

name: Apples and Asteroids
description: Collect apples. Avoid asteroids. It's as simple as that...or is it? Join Q-Boy in this 2D platform as he seeks victory!

name: An Opportunity
description: So you know that one rover that landed on Mars? Yeah this isn't that.

name: Anomaly
description: Anomaly is a horror game inspired by Scanner Somber and the Garry's Mod game mode, LiDAR. Try to escape from the level that you are in by finding keys and the exit, while not being killed by the Anomaly!

name: 0 World TD
description: 0 World TD is a 2d tower defence game with deep combat system, highly adjustable difficulty settings and many more features!

name: All Hallows Evie
description: All Hallows Evie is a Halloween themed single screen style platform game moulded on the 8 bit classics of the ZX Spectrum.

name: Alpaclands
description: Alpaclands is a relaxing strategy game about creating unusual landscapes by growing colourful plants on small islands.

name: Amata
description: Rage across the mad realms of a dead god as Charlet, the immortal artificer. Explore a vast, arcane desolation wrought by hatred. Cleanse the twisted inhabitants of ancient, forgotten worlds. Help Charlet find a way home using her powerful and varied suite of combat and platforming abilities.

name: Amongst the Neon Lights
description: Dodge bullets like your life depends on it! Help Royal to fight against an evil being sending bullets and beams at you to the beat.

name: Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes
description: Beware, ruler - tread carefully with those you call friend or enemy; they are two sides of the same coin. Your relationships matter more than ever, and with Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes, witness those closest to you come alive in the most intimate detail.

name: Cyber Attack
description: VR Co-op board game when players will fight against ship AI on board and inside of it at the same time. Hack all robots, and be prepared to protect yourself inside of the ship, solve 3D puzzles and help your friends.

name: Darkness Revenge
description: Choose between a male or female character and take revenge on your killers as a vampire!

name: Day of the Shell
description: Day of the Shell is a “one-click, one-turn” tactical rogue-lite. In a shattered and flooded world, travel from island to island with only hope and a revolver, challenging and appeasing the gods.

name: Death in the Night
description: A puzzle platformer with deadly dangers.

name: Death or Treat
description: “Death or Treat” is an action rogue-lite, Hack and Slash and 2D with traditional animations and handpainted environments.You will play as Scary, the owner of Ghost Mart. The Halloween spirit is missing. Join Scary to save HallowTown.

name: Death Rattle: Evil Onslaught
description: Fight your way through the realm of Ulliadore on a quest that balances the fate of the entire realm. Use a variety of ancient and epic weapons to vanquish your foes. Find enemies weaknesses and avoid their strengths as you battle to become the ultimate warrior and protector of the realm.

name: Deathwish
description: Trapped, Alone and long away from real world, a man must make his way through dangerous places to find a way out

name: Deception
description: Deception is co-op horror survival party game. Stop one of your friends who turned into an evil monster from killing you and your teammates. Gather puzzle hints and communicate with your hacker teammate and solve puzzles to escape the evil forest.

name: Decks Against Destiny
description: Decks Against Destiny is a rogue-like, card collecting, tactics game where the player makes decisions in an overworld that determine in-game events to impact reputation with various factions. A ticking clock to an ending battle is looming, so decisions must be made to determine fate.

name: X-Plane 12
description: X-Plane 12 is the world’s most comprehensive and powerful flight simulator for personal computers, and it offers the most realistic flight model available. X-Plane is not a game, but an engineering tool that can be used to predict the flying qualities of fixed- and rotary-wing aircraft with incredible accuracy.

name: Aeroporto 83
description: Aeroporto 83 is an action shooter game developed by Renato Degiovani and published by the magazine Micro Sistemas, it is considered to be one of the first Brazilian computer games to be commercially released.

name: Snow of Spirit
description: Sin descripción

name: Itchy Scratchy
description:
A person approaches you with a simple request: "Friend! I have itch, scratch for me?" How can you resist? They seem so nice, so itchy, and oh so scratchable.
Warning: This game is way too short and will leave you dissatisfied. But, hey, it's free. Play at your own risk.

name: Ninja Gaiden Hurricane Pack II
description:
The second of two DLC packs released for Ninja Gaiden (2004) for the Xbox. This one features the same additions as the first Hurricane Pack, such as free camera control and the Intercept technique which would be cut from later releases. While the first Hurricane Pack was a variation on the main campaign with new weapons and such, this one is a multi-phase gauntlet of enemies that would serve as the basis for the Mission Mode in Ninja Gaiden Black.

Just as with the first Hurricane Pack, this is no longer available to download due to the closure of Xbox Live for the original Xbox in 2010. It is now only accessible through a modded Xbox system or a console that still contains a save file.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - 10th Anniversary Edition
description: Welcome back to Vice City. Welcome back to the 1980s.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
description: In the year 1986, Tommy Vercetti is heavily indebted to his mafia superiors after a drug deal gone awry, but his dreams of taking over Vice City (based on Miami) push him down a different path. Featuring a wide variety of vehicles and weapons, radio stations playing hit songs from the era and an intense atmosphere, GTA: Vice City is an open-world sandbox satire of '80's Miami.

name: Kitten's Head Football
description: No way, the game with kittens and football? Don’t look on these cute paws, they can show you what they got! This is a good chance to show them who is the best kitten in the house!

name: Pandaty
description: Pandaty is 2D Cute Platformer Game, Explore this sweet world of adventure! Our character must pass the sweetly designed levels, But watch out! Sometimes they may not be so sweet!

name: Annihilate
description: Sin descripción

name: Foxy Land 2
description: Foxy Land 2 is a continuation of the adventures of the plucky Foxy fox. This time his children have been kidnapped. This was done by the nefarious brothers Fulfy, when Foxy went in search of food. But he won't be looking for his children alone, but with his wife Jenny. So now the game supports a game for two. To fight with enemies, you can now throw cherries at them. Jump to deftly and accurately to prevent the villains in their plans to kidnap young foxes. Explore the island, avoid the traps and get acquainted with the inhabitants of the island. Go forth to adventure and victory over evil!

name: PartyToons
description: Sin descripción

name: Gullo Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Hitman 3: Deluxe Pack
description:
The Hitman 3: Deluxe Pack adds new content to Hitman 3.

- Deluxe Escalation Contracts
- Deluxe Suits and Items
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital “World of HITMAN” Book
- Director Commentary (Mission Introduction)

The Deluxe Pack is also included in the Hitman 3: Deluxe Edition.

name: Cyber Protocol + Clumsy Rush + Brawl Chess
description: Want to feel like a cyberpunk hacker? Save your friend by beating 100 levels of security system in this hardcore arcade puzzle game. If you'd like, you can also challenge others in Brawl Chess, a chess game with a lively cartoon style. In case you want to spend time with more people, Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of laughter for friends and family.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Ultimate Edition
description: Immerse yourself into Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with the Ultimate Edition. Included are the base game and the Pathogen expansion with its new campaign, new weapons and more! Plus, both the Endeavor Pass and Veteran Pack!

name: Prison Architect: Escape Mode
description: Swap the role of architect for inmate and try to break out of your prisons! Will you earn essential cash by working an honest job, or steal money from your fellow inmates? Will you plan a stealthy underground escape or raid an armoury and shoot your way out? Whatever you do, remember to bring plenty of bacon to bribe the sniffer dogs with.

name: Cities: Skylines - Ultimate Content Bundle
description: The Ultimate Content Bundle is the one-stop option to experience all Cities: Skylines has to offer. Find every expansion, all content creator packs, and the complete music collection in one package. Build the best cities in the world using everything from all nine expansions including the newest release, Sunset Harbor. Dive into more than three years worth of content for the ultimate city building experience!

name: Cities: Skylines - Downtown Bundle
description: Cities: Skylines' Downtown Bundle adds modern commercial wall-to-wall buildings and 16 modern lounge tracks. Chill out with nearly an hour of relaxing music while building city centers utilizing 39 unique models from modder Jason “AmiPolizeiFunk” Ditmars.

name: Ballspell
description:
Ballspell is a short zuma-like game where you play as a wizard, trying to take down your teachers. Shoot magic at a train of enemies, matching colors to defeat them.

However, be aware, some enemies have special abilities that will complicate things, such as shields that bounce off your magic, or imps that will speed up the train when woken up.

Luckily you learn new spells by defeating your teachers, giving you additional tools in taking them all down!

name: Twin Hobo Rocket
description: Two hobos go on a quest to collect the spare change of the universe.

name: Faraway Proximity
description: Faraway Proximity is a third-person puzzle game about recovering lost books. You have been contacted to recover a set of misplaced books. Find them by solving different types of challenges and uncover more puzzles by reading their contents.

name: Farm Wars: The Farmer's Wrath
description: When alien beings decide to invade and conquer Earth, they don't expect such a powerful enemy: A very angry farmer, join him in the battle against dangerous and lethal aliens and win back the farm that is rightfully yours.

name: Fast or Dead VR
description: Welcome to the dark world of Fast or Dead VR game, arcade auto-simulator + shooter. You'll find an upgrade and customization system, angry zombie pedestrians and surviving car owners, and much more to enjoy gameplay using your VR-headset!

name: Fears to Fathom: Carson House
description: In the third episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Noah Baker, an 18 year old who got a small job offer to house-sit for the COO of a local media company for the weekend, he takes the offer as he had nothing interesting going on for that weekend. It wasn't long before he began experiencing something very unsettling about the place. Little did he know what was about to come.

name: Final Recurrence
description: With so many missing persons cases revolving the Shepherd's Hill forest, why is yours any different?

name: Fishori
description: Explore and discover a peaceful idle fishing game set on a marooned island in the middle of nowhere. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into the deep seas, and fish your way from rags to riches.

name: Fix My Cat Doc
description: Fix My Cat Doc game is a simulator in which you are acting as a veterinarian. Your mission is to save as many animals as possible from torment and pain.

name: Fix My Legs Doc
description: Who will take care of our health if not us? Fix My Legs Doc, is a simulation game in which you have the chance to be a Doctor, where your mission is to help different patients to heal their legs to feel good.

name: Flagi
description: Fight your way to victory!

name: Flerp
description: Fend off hordes of enemies in this arcade tower defense roguelite with autobattler elements. Build up a team of powerful synergies and become unstoppable.

name: Fold Stories
description: An inner journey mixing exploration and puzzles in a dreamlike origami world.

name: Forests, Fields and Fortresses
description:
Forests, Fields and Fortresses - is a mix of a puzzle and a board game in which you have to build your kingdom.

In the Puzzle Mode, play handcrafted levels with a small number of pieces of territory. Your goal is to place them in such a way as to earn the required amount of gold.

In the Adventure Mode, start the game with a random map and an endless supply of pieces of territory.

name: Forest Tower Defense
description: Wrrrrrr….The evil spirits are approaching the town again. The locals can no longer feel safe like before. Welcome in this new tower defense game.

name: Forward Team
description: A team of four sets out on a journey to find the magic mirror. Change the position of the adventurers to determine whether they will be greeted by： monsters，traps,or treasure！ Your wisdom will lead the brave team through this wonderful adventure!

name: Glass Bridge
description: This is a Roguelike survival strategy game, where players click on glass to advance and jump, choose the correct glass by chance, and use skills by strategy. It has a certain scary flavor.

name: GodMod
description: GodMod is an asymmetric, cross platform, action survival online multiplayer game designed for up to 8 players, wherein 2 among 8 players will be chosen randomly to eliminate the other 6 players.

name: Goetita: Turn-based City
description: Goetita: Turn-based city is a turn-based strategy game controlling the element of luck through rational judgment. Survive even in a desperate situation when all your resources are running out with your strategy in the cold and dark city!

name: Gold of Lotusland
description: In Gold Of Lotusland you play as the Lead Engineer Daniel Quinn as he uncovers the dark truth about the robots he designed.

name: Grappling Dash
description: Jump, Swing, Dash Grappling Dash is fast-pace, uniquely stylized platformer game. Use your grappling hook to swing around in giant levels, dash through energy crystals, find hidden secrets and master even the most difficult worlds. It’s easy to play, it’s fast and it’s fun.

name: Guncar Arena
description: Guncar Arena is an 80s inspired roguelite vehicular combat bullet hell arena shooter. Drive and shoot your muscle car trough alien hordes and tune it with synergizing upgrades to build an absolute engine of destruction!

name: It's Only Money
description: The mayor of Rockhaven threw you down a hole into the Undercity. Why? Net worth too low. In this 1-4 player low-life simulation, emerge to the surface to steal from the rich, fight tycoons and reclaim the city block by block. Buy houses, businesses and whatever your materialistic heart desires!

name: Jelly in the Dark
description: Jelly bear who fell into an ant kingdom, Lucky! Can he survive with a sweet smell against ants? (Caution! There is not one way out.)

name: Jet & Sky
description: Grab a partner and work together to defeat crime on jetskis! Jet and Sky are two old friends from high school who spend their days keeping The City safe from criminals with the help of Sarah3000, the latest in artificial intelligence for jetskis.

name: Jump Journey
description: Jump Journey is a rogelike 2d side scrolling platformer. Avoid obstacles in this fast-paced game, where the movement never stops. Get gems to unlock upgrades for each run. Play enough runs and you can get permanent upgrades. Each level plays a bit differently, learn to master them all.

name: Just Drive
description: Make a custom vehical. Race to the finish line, with either friends or strangers. Use your cars speed boost, or flight abilities to navigate around the open world. Shoot lasers and bullets at those who get ahead of you, and send them back to the last checkpoint.

name: Karate Beasts
description: Karate Beasts is a story based simulated 2D game you have to train your beast in order to be the best and restore your family's pride by beating the villain named Dark Sensei's beast.

name: Kewbii
description: Make the 'Kewb' roll and explore hundred of colorful stages. Discover and use several powers to complete levels, achieve their quests and solve their puzzles... or you can chill out and create your own ones!

name: Kiss the Demiurge
description: Minori is a mage tasked with hiding magic from the world. She has spurned love in the pursuit of her mission. One day she meets a group of three girls obsessed with magic. Will she stop them from discovering real magic? Or will she fall for their charms? Find out in this dramatic girls-love story.

name: Package Rush
description: Package Rush is a strategy game about planning a delivery route system in a fast-growing city. Build and modify routes to get all packages on time. How long can you keep delivering?

name: Mimetic Love
description: Three men and one destiny. What will happen? Difficulties and overcoming. Get ready to live this adventure. Nothing will be as it once was. Everything has its time... And here will not be the exception... Love, jealousy, resentment and forgiveness.

name: Mini Arenas
description: Mini Arenas is a fast-paced PVP arena shooter in which you and your friends can play and fight together. Play on a variety of stages and choose to play as one of four classes as you fight to be the last player alive!

name: Mining Odyssey
description: Come and learn the way of the goblin miner. Take your pickaxe and your grappling gun and challenge the goblin miner exam! A dynamic first-person platformer game that will put your dexterity and perseverance to the test!

name: Minschima
description: Minschima is a relaxing puzzle game where you need to match all targets to restore the broken shapes in the board. Pieces move together. Match all targets. Solve puzzles.

name: Miramixi Storyteller
description: Miramixi Storyteller is designed to provide a new gaming experience and convenient functionality for organizing the gameplay of pen and paper RPGs. Share your own worlds where other players can immerse themselves in exciting adventures with a great story.

name: Mirror Broken
description: Solve the sleeping puzzle to get the beauties' hearts

name: Model Builder: Aether
description: What if you could experience the freedom of riding a motorcycle without all the pollution? This is what Lin Yu Cheng has envisioned as he works on Aether, his concept motorcycle. This is an e-motorbike embodying the next level of innovation and beauty for sci-fi lovers.

name: Monster Slayer Extermination
description: Exterminate once and for all the zombies and creatures that are loose in the city. Survive the chaos caused by mutants, monsters, and hideous creatures as you make your way to your escape route, but be warned, you're not going to be let off the hook.

name: Motel Styx
description: Come to a Motel on the edge of the underworld and follow a trail of cryptic puzzles to learn the story that brought you here. Motel Styx is a story-driven 3D puzzler. Players can expect a menagerie of escape-room style puzzles and interactive environmental story-telling.

name: Motherless
description: This is Sunny's story, he was separated from his mother at birth, knowing almost nothing about his past he'll try to find her. Help him find his mother and you'll be rewarded greatly during this process.

name: Mirror War: Reincarnation of Holiness
description: Mirror War-Reincarnation of Holiness is a 3D arcade shooting RPG with tremendous volume of quests according to epic scenario.Choose one of the sections aiming for hegemony on the world, and lead the race to victory with legendary items and super controls!

name: Miss Kawaii
description: Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey has started. Relax, clear your mind and enjoy)

name: Lustful Ponies 2
description: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 pony girls with different personalities and fetishes.

name: Mage Lords of Brams
description: Mage Lords of Brams is a "bullet heaven"/"reverse bullet hell" roguelite. Slaughter countless fantasy enemies with your powerful spells, powers and artifacts while gathering research scrolls to improve future runs inbetween levels. Thousands of race/class/item combinations allow for endless variety.

name: Magic Market
description: Help fund your arch-wizard overlords' research by trading potions and spells on the Magic Market. Buy low and sell high before the market closes! Master this simple, yet fast-paced, strategy game by chaining spells together to maximize your earnings. But don't get caught cheating the market!

name: Maki: Paw of Fury
description: Maki: Paw of Fury is a beautifully animated fighting game in the style of retro arcade gems. Use your martial arts skills to stun and defeat your opponents and kick the main villain’s ass!

name: ManneKin: Hessler Storage
description: ManneKin: Hessler Storage is a first-person psychological horror. Investigate and explore an abandoned storage facility, uncover the mystery of its previous use, and escape with your life.

name: Military Attack
description: Herman, a member of the armed forces, was assigned, along with his platoon, to locate a large-caliber weapon that is in possession of the enemy country's army.

name: Microscopic
description: In the year 2066, mankind has finally achieved the pinnacle in medical discovery with the massive deployment of nanotechnology. Play as Venture, a new nanobot in this top down atmospheric adventure game to seek out what went wrong in the medical disaster.
